title: Silver Jeans Co. Women's Tuesday Low Rise Slim Bootcut Jeans
description: CAREFREE STYLE. Fashion & comfort meet with jeans that combine trends and contemporary style. These jeans are sure to become a closet staple with a distinct cut that will set you apart. Rise: 7.75" mid rise; Inseam: 31/33/35" inseams; Leg Opening: 17"

A DENIM UPGRADE. The low rise design sits further down on the hips complements your curves. These pants combine trend and timeless fashion with a fit and cut that can be dressed up or down for your casual days or days when you want to make a statement.
PREMIUM DENIM CONSTRUCTION. These jeans are made from a well-done cotton-blend denim for a great fit that will hold shape throughout the day and night.
CLEAN, CLASSIC STYLING. These jeans for ladies feature a smooth, unembellished pocket for a crisp look. Pair them with your favorite blouse, tee, cardigan, or blazer for an instant style upgrade.

Silver Jeans Co. Tuesday Low Rise Slim Bootcut Jeans - If a low rise is your go-to, Tuesday was made for you. The hip-hugging fit provides just enough coverage, flattering a variety of body types—especially those with short torsos. The slim fit sculpts to the hip and thigh and lifts your backside for an all-over flattering look.
